Name: Taha
description:
Taha is 22 years old and married. His spouse is a housewife. He has a small plot of agricultural land that measures about eight kirats. Taha is very knowledgeable about cultivating dill, an aromatic herb of the parsley family with fine blue-green leaves and yellow flowers. The leaves and seeds of the dill plant are used for seasoning food and for medicinal purposes.

Taha is requesting a loan to buy dill seeds, organic fertilizers, and equipment to help with cultivation. He wants to expand his sales into the markets so that he can sell more to other traders.

Taha hopes to increase his income because his wife will have a baby, so he will need to cover her medical expenses. He looks forward to having a lovely family and wants to provide a stable life for his wife and child.
